biotools.summary: DRAGoM (Detection of RNA using Assembly Graph from Metagenomics data) is a tool for metagenomic noncoding RNA profiling and biomarker discovery. DRAGoM is a tool designed to predict and assemble ncRNA from next generation sequencing data.

bioschemas.name: DRAGoM
bioschemas.summary: DRAGoM (Detection of RNA using Assembly Graph from Metagenomics data) is a tool for metagenomic noncoding RNA profiling and biomarker discovery. DRAGoM is a tool designed to predict and assemble ncRNA from next generation sequencing data.
